    "images/awards/IIT Excellence Awards/486787771_1092192252947071_766086986170333979_n-2.jpg",
    # Competitions
    "images/competitions/OpenHack 2.0 - IIT 2023/20230219_094106.jpg",
    "images/competitions/OpenHack 2.0 - IIT 2023/20230219_094227.jpg",
    "images/competitions/OpenHack 2.0 - IIT 2023/20230219_074251.jpg",
    "images/competitions/PyHack 2.0/20230916_115753.jpg",

    "images/competitions/CYPHER - WIE KDU/20230503_171143.jpg",
    "images/competitions/CYPHER - WIE KDU/IMG-20230503_WA0104.jpg",
    "images/competitions/Rootcode Tech-Triathlon/462896881_1100444525422401_8952256454275248325_n.jpg",
    "images/competitions/RevolUX - 2021/IMG-20220727-WA0007.jpg",
    # Volunteer
    "images/volunteering/Guest Speaker/Data Science Inauguration 2026 /photos/631308478_1282402193933691_2917253508663517504_n.jpg",
    "images/volunteering/Guest Speaker/Data Science Inauguration 2026 /photos/630766904_1282399197267324_5283366220230889590_n.jpg",
    "images/volunteering/Guest Speaker/CodeRally6.0/photos/515437114_122125870400888601_7820202540169224471_n.jpg",

    "images/volunteering/Judging and Evaluation/Cutting Edge/IMG_4216.jpg",
]

missing = []
for img in images:
    if not os.path.exists\(img\):
        missing.append\(img\)

if missing:
    print\(f"Missing images \({len\(missing\)}\):"\)
    for m in missing:
        print\(f"  - {m}"\)
else:
    print\("All images exist!"\)

\\n' for path, folder in awards_images: awards_html += f'

\\n' awards_html += '
' # Generate HTML for competitions carousel comp_html = '

Bash(python3 << 'EOF'
import re

with open\('index.html', 'r'\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

# Count images in each carousel
awards_imgs = re.findall\(r'id="awards-carousel">.*?<div class="carousel-slide">', content, re.DOTALL\)
print\(f"Awards carousel found: {len\(awards_imgs\)}"\)

# Let's count img tags after each carousel id
awards_section = re.search\(r'id="awards-carousel">\(.*?\)<button class="carousel-btn prev">', content, re.DOTALL\)
if awards_section:
    print\(f"Awards section length: {len\(awards_section.group\(1\)\)}"\)
    print\(f"Awards slides: {awards_section.group\(1\).count\('class=\\"carousel-slide\\"'\)}"\)
EOF)
Bash(python3 << 'EOF' import re import os with open\('index.html', 'r'\) as f: content = f.read\(\) # Find all image src in carousel slides img_pattern = r'

Bash(python3 << 'EOF'
with open\('styles.css', 'r'\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

# Fix duplicate closing braces
content = content.replace\('};', '}'\)
content = content.replace\('\\n}\\n}\\n', '\\n}\\n'\)

with open\('styles.css', 'w'\) as f:
    f.write\(content\)

print\("Fixed!"\)
EOF)

Bash(python3 << 'EOF'
with open\('styles.css', 'r'\) as f:
    content = f.read\(\)

# Fix duplicate braces and semicolons
content = content.replace\('};', '}'\)
content = content.replace\('}}', '}'\)

with open\('styles.css', 'w'\) as f:
    f.write\(content\)

print\("Fixed CSS braces"\)
EOF)
